section.title: Introduction
section.abstract: This is a layer of philosophy in the context of which all other philosphy at RBJones.com is undertaken. It enjoinders a gentle, unhurried approach both to thinking about the world and to acting our part in it. That part should be our own, reflecting and expressing our inner selves to which attention is desirable.

sbcol.subsec:
The basic ideas here are:
Take it with a pinch of salt
Please yourself
Be yourself

Which philosophically translate into:
theoretical scepticism
practical scepticism
existential expressionism
